translation.job_title: IT Engineer | Web Developer | Network Expert
translation.about_me_paragraph_1: Graduate of Information Technology from Sana'a University with extensive experience in web development and network management. I have a great passion for technology and innovation, and I always strive to develop advanced technical solutions that meet customer needs.
translation.about_me_paragraph_2: I have experience in developing web applications using Django and Flutter, database management, as well as designing and implementing complex networks. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and keeping up with the latest technological developments.
translation.booking_system_description: Integrated web and mobile application for booking accommodation with user-friendly interface and advanced booking management
translation.fuel_storage_system_description: Comprehensive system for warehouse management with inventory tracking and detailed report generation
translation.millunieumsoft_website_description: Integrated website with Windows program connected to the same database
translation.contact_me_description: I welcome contact to discuss career opportunities or collaboration on technical projects
